name: Phone
description: Client is a single mother who had been unemployed for a period due to parenting needs. The family does not have additional expenses for additional items. Client hopes to be able to reduce her phone expenses by having a house phone instead of only relying on her hp. Owning a home phone would allow client to reduce her phone bills.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

passiton.name: Phone cases
passiton.description:
I have shut down my online business, hence these are the left inventory stocks which would like to bless to someone who keen to take all the stocks.
Including Iphone 11,12, 13 casing,iphone watch strap, Iphone cables,phone rings, etc. Pls arrange your own transport to carry all the stocks.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

name: Phone
description: Client, husband and her 4 children (F20, M17, M10 and M5) are living in a rental flat. Client is full time caregiver to her youngest son who has autism and ADHD. Her husband is working as a grabfood rider and family is not on any financial assistance as husband's income is sufficient for family's basic needs. M5 recently threw client's phone, resulting in parts of the screen going blank and unresponsive. As finances are tight and only sufficient for basic needs, she is unable to afford another phone and would appreciate any brand of Android phone.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

name: Baby Cot
description: Client is currently pregnant with triplets and is due to give birth in July. She has 4 other young children and together with her husband, the family of 6 is sustaining on husbandâ€™s income as a delivery rider. With the upcoming birth of the triplets, there are foreseeable increasing financial challenges for the family in meeting their needs adequately. The family is looking for a baby cot for the triplets and will benefit from donations to alleviate the financial costs. Interested donors kindly contact social worker Theresa at 6365 8751

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Lei Hui Yun

passiton.name: Baby Cot/Playpen

name: TV
description: This is a young single mother (24 year old) with a 6 year old daughter. Mother is currently doing ad-hoc delivery jobs which does not pay well. She has been having difficulty in maintaining her employment due to caregiving of her child. They recently moved out from the crisis shelter to their own rental flat and is in need of furnishings in their house. The TV is daughter's request to mother as she wishes to watch TV for entertainment. Donor to kindly arrange for own delivery as client is unable to afford delivery fees.

name: Toaster
description: Client is a 44-year-old single father with a daughter aged 15, and two sons aged 10 and 9 years old. He is presently caring for his two sons who is living with him. While concerns remain for the children's care arrangements, client has been open to support and services from stakeholders. Currently, he is requesting for a toaster to help in his care for his two sons.
